original_title: The Fairy Tales of the Brothers Grimm: Hansel and Gretel / Brother and Sister
overview: This animated tale, adapted from the Grimms' "Hansel and Gretel," tells the story of two curious children who can't control their appetite for sweets. A bonus feature, "Brother and Sister," is also included.
title: The Fairy Tales of the Brothers Grimm: Hansel and Gretel / Brother and Sister
